mapper.select: SELECT * FROM user_inventory WHERE id = #{id} AND is_deleted = 0

SELECT ui.id, ui.template_id, it.name AS item_name, it.icon_url, ui.wear_value, ui.pattern_index, ui.status, ui.get_time FROM user_inventory ui LEFT JOIN base_item_template it ON ui.template_id = it.id AND it.is_deleted = 0 WHERE ui.id = #{id} AND ui.is_deleted = 0
SELECT status, COUNT(*) AS count FROM user_inventory WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND is_deleted = 0 GROUP BY status

SELECT it.rarity, COUNT(*) AS count FROM user_inventory ui LEFT JOIN base_item_template it ON ui.template_id = it.id AND it.is_deleted = 0 WHERE ui.user_id = #{userId} AND ui.is_deleted = 0 GROUP BY it.rarity

SELECT it.type, COUNT(*) AS count FROM user_inventory ui LEFT JOIN base_item_template it ON ui.template_id = it.id AND it.is_deleted = 0 WHERE ui.user_id = #{userId} AND ui.is_deleted = 0 GROUP BY it.type
SELECT COALESCE(SUM(mp.price), 0) FROM user_inventory ui LEFT JOIN item_market_price mp ON ui.template_id = mp.template_id WHERE ui.user_id = #{userId} AND ui.is_deleted = 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_inventory (user_id, template_id, wear_value, pattern_index, status, get_time, is_deleted) VALUES (#{userId}, #{templateId}, #{wearValue}, #{patternIndex}, #{status}, #{getTime}, 0)
mapper.update: UPDATE user_inventory SET user_id = #{userId}, template_id = #{templateId}, wear_value = #{wearValue}, pattern_index = #{patternIndex}, status = #{status} WHERE id = #{id} AND is_deleted = 0
UPDATE user_inventory SET is_deleted = 1 WHERE id = #{id}
